column4: Alright, I edited the file...When I exit out of the terminal, will it have been saved?
Alright, and it didn't actually change anything....
None of these text editors will let me change the file
is the file actually "read-only"?  use ls -l to see the permissions on the file and see if it's rwx for your user
i wouldn't remove that file!  it's an L by the way
you can use your windows install of wine.  See https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WorldofWarcraft for more details.
see the Ubuntu Documents link i sent you for tips.
do you have the bar on the left?
download the torrent with your web browser, then open or double click the torrent file after download and hopefully it will open with Transmission
plouffe uninstall pulseaudio isn't the worlds best advice...
lspci | grep -i audio for exact model
